description:
Futaba has been acting odd lately, and Nuku Nuku wants to find out why. But when Futaba`s crush sells her a hypnotic book of poetry created by Mishima Industries, she starts acting even stranger! Nuku Nuku is the only one who can bring her back to her senses.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku Kandou! Futaba-chan no Hatsukoi
Nuku Nuku is excited - Futaba is excited
ヌクヌク感動! 二葉ちゃんの初恋
